title: 38 printing tools
description:
.1 - roulette with wooden handle
.2 - mezzatint rocker with dark wooden handle
.3 - scraper - 3 sided with wooden handle
.4 - woodcut knife
.5 - burnisher with wooden handle
.6-.7 - dabbers (2)
.8 - ground in silk cover
.9 - hammer - metal head with wooden handle
.10 - gouger
.11-.13 - lithograph crayons (3 - one broken)
.14 - clamp with wooden handle
.15 - etcher - spiral shaped, double pointed
.16-.33 - burins (14 wood handled, 4 cork handled)
.34 - extra wooden handle for burin
.35-.36 - 2 metal shafts for burins
.37 - ink roller
.38 - etching needle (in box with burins)
.39 - woodblock with copper plate
.40 - square metal weight
.41-.46 - printed materials (6 pages) (4 pages of tool definitions from book by F.W. Devoe and C.T. Raynolds Co.)
